title: Snippit
header: A customizable React code editor with syntax highlighting, theme control, and export options
description: A responsive web app for reading, writing, and modifying code with customizable fonts, text sizes, padding, and light/dark themes — supporting multiple languages and allowing export as PDF, JPG, or shareable links.
features: Real-time code editing with syntax highlighting using React Syntax Highlighter.
Customization options for font style, text size, padding, and background color.
Light and dark theme toggle for an adaptive editing experience.
Supports multiple programming languages for syntax highlighting.
Export code snippets as PDF or JPG using html2canvas.
Copy code, image, or shareable link directly with one click.
Responsive interface built with React and Tailwind CSS.
Integrated Google Fonts for enhanced typography customization.
whatILearned: Learned to capture webpage sections using html2canvas.
Understood how html2canvas renders styled DOM elements.
Integrated react-syntax-highlighter for clean code display.
Improved handling of async rendering in React components.
Enhanced UI by combining visuals with highlighted code.
